sentences.en: A : Blatty's Oscar - award - winning screenplay was, in fact, based on a real - life case of demonic possession.
sentences.cn: 布莱特得到奥斯卡金像奖的最佳剧本, 事实上是根据被魔鬼附身的真实事件.

sentences.en: Although the heroes defeat Baal, his demonic army continues to advance.
sentences.cn: 虽然Baal被打败, 但他的军团仍然继续在杀戮.

sentences.en: Jas. 3:15 This wisdom is not that which descends from above, but is earthly, soulish, demonic.
sentences.cn: 雅三15这样的智慧,不是从上头下来的, 乃是属地的 、 属魂的 、 出于鬼且像鬼的.

sentences.en: Something demonic in him -- something that could be cruel.
sentences.cn: 他体内的魔鬼似的东西 —— 很残忍的东西.

sentences.en: the demonic forces in the universe
The orcs of Outland were not the only ones to suffer the Burning Legion's demonic corruption.
sentences.cn: 外域的兽人并不是唯一饱受燃烧军团堕落力量欺凌的种族.

sentences.en: This wisdom is not that which comes down from above, but is earthly , natural, demonic.
sentences.cn: 雅3:15这样的智慧、是从上头来的 、 是属地的、情欲的 、 鬼魔的.

sentences.en: Weakening Strike Weakening Strike improves Demonic Strike ability.
sentences.cn: 弱化攻击削弱自身物理攻击增强魔力.

words.tran_cn: 恶魔；魔鬼；精力充沛的人；邪恶的事物

trans.tran_cn: 恶魔的，魔鬼似的，恶魔般的
